Welcome to Coin Catcher! In this game, your goal is to catch
coins while exploring the map.
You can you use the joystick on the left of the screen to move. Drag your finger across the right side of the screen to change where you are looking!
To catch a coin all you have to do is click on it! Give it a try. Try to find a coin!
Good job, that's it! To finish the tutorial just find the other four coins! Good luck!
You've completed the tutorial, you may now proceed to the game!
Hi, I'm Michael! Unfortunately my dad died two days ago and I can't find his watch because I'm blind. Could you please help me find it? It should be around the house somewhere...
Yes, Michael. I'll find the watch!
Sorry, I don't have time for that
What do you want to do?
Give the watch back to Michael
Sell the watch for 3 coins
Thank you so much for giving me back the watch
What do you want to do?
Give the homeless 2 coins
Take the 3 coins from the homeless
Ignore
The old man has just been mugged, what do you want to do?
Follow the thief
Nothing because I'm scared of hurting myself
Nothing because it's not my problem
I'm sorry but I need this money to feed both my sons, I've been trying to get a job for a long time but no one accepts me...
What do you want to do?
Take the money back to the old man
Take the money and keep the 3 coins
Take the money back to the old man and give 3 coins to this man
Let him take the money
To finish the game you need to find the
coins

You often display a lack of empathy and integrity, often resorting to selfish actions without consideration for the consequences on others. Your choices prioritize personal gain at the expense of fairness and cooperation. You may exhibit traits of manipulation or deceit, showing little regard for the well-being or rights of others.

You demonstrate a mixed moral stance, sometimes displaying empathy and altruism, but occasionally succumbing to self-interest or ethical shortcuts. Your decisions may vary in consistency, reflecting a blend of virtuous and morally ambiguous behaviors. While you strive for fairness and kindness, you may falter in situations that test your resolve or present personal temptations.

You consistently uphold principles of integrity, compassion, and fairness in your actions within the game. You prioritize the well-being of others, demonstrating empathy, honesty, and a commitment to ethical conduct. Your choices reflect a strong moral compass, guided by a sense of responsibility towards fellow players and the game environment as a whole.
